title: (2016) RICK REDBEARD - AWAKE UNTO [FLAC,TRACKS] {100.XY}
description:
(2016) Rick Redbeard - Awake Unto



Review: 
In some ways, Rick Redbeardâ€™s second solo album is a neat bridge between his debut and his more fleshed-out work with The Phantom Band. 
No Selfish Heart was stark and elegant, a world away from the often rollicking output of the Phantoms. Awake Unto, on the other hand, ventures boldly into folk-rock territory more than once: neither of the full-blooded â€˜Golden Ageâ€™ and â€˜In My Wakeâ€™ would seem out of place on Strange Friend, while the 50s-tinged â€˜The Night is All Oursâ€™ strays further still from the beaten path.
But itâ€™s when Redbeardâ€™s clear-as-a-bell voice is allowed to resonate boldly through the reverb and the subtle strings that this record finds its finest moments. â€˜Unfoundâ€™, the â€˜Field Yearsâ€™ and â€˜Yuki Onnaâ€™ are a haunting, ethereal trio, while the gothic â€˜What Fine Peopleâ€™ is one of the finest in his canon. The plaintive air of the debut remains, but is elevated by the occasional harmony and wheeze of reed.
